error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'monthly_growth_rate' (value: 0.5) was used instead of 'annual_growth_rate' (value: 6.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 60
His hair grew 36 inches - 6 inches = <<36-6=30>>30 inches
Hair grows at a rate of 12 months/year * 0.5 inches/month =<<12*0.5=6>>6 inches/year
It took him 30 inches / 0.5 inches/year = <<30/0.5=60>>60 years to grow his hair out.
